items.sentence: I think you should stay home from school tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't the best student in this class.
Tom probably isn't the tallest person in the room.
Tom probably isn't going to be here all afternoon.
Why didn't you just do what you'd been told to do?
I thought that you used to teach French in Boston.
I'm still not certain what time I should be there.
On my way to the theater I saw a traffic accident.
The last time I saw Tom was last summer in Boston.
There's one thing I need to do before I can leave.
Tom's body was found in the shed behind his house.
There was candle wax on the table near the candle.
Why don't we try doing this the way Tom suggested?
This is the most interesting novel I've ever read.
If you ever do that again, Tom will be very angry.
Tom spent all afternoon playing with his children.
I believe that Tom said that he'd be here by 2:30.
We should be in Boston by 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
Tom had never dreamed that he could feel so happy.
Do you think that it'll be easy for me to do that?
